column4: Question: I have XGL and compiz installed. But only some of the effects are responding. I can get wobbly windows and rain and such, but the rotating cube isn't responding to the hot keys I'm assigning. Any ideas where i should start

Question: I have XGL and compiz installed. But only some of the effects are responding. I can get wobbly windows and rain and such, but the rotating cube isn't responding to the hot keys I'm assigning. Any ideas where i should start
